amendment.description: To enhance efforts to combat the piracy of United States copyrighted materials.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1144 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1144 proposed by Senator Allen to Amendment SA 1136. (consideration: CR S9108-9111; text: CR S9108) To enhance efforts to combat the piracy of United States copyrighted materials.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1144 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1144 proposed by Senator Allen to Amendment SA 1136.
